nodes.text: This unknown male Adumari was a lean man with an artificial leg, the result of being hit with shrapnel from his own Blade-28 after ejecting from the disintegrating fighter.

During Red Flight's—which consisted of New Republic pilots Wedge Antilles, Tycho Celchu, Derek Klivian and Wes Janson—diplomatic visit to Adumar, he invited them to his home for dinner where he had them tell him their exploits.
